## My analysis

I tested for a relationship between flipper length and body mass, sex, species, and the interaction between sex and species.
I repeated this analysis for bill length.

## Results

Response: flipper length

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: "asis"
tar_read(flipper_table) |> knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```

Body mass, sex, species, and the interaction between sex and species are significant


Response: bill_length

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: "asis"
tar_read(bill_table) |> knitr::kable(digits = 3)
```


```{r}
#| echo: false
ggplot(data, aes(x = body_mass_g, y = bill_length_mm, color = species, shape = sex)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Bill length")
```

```{r}

```
